alert.note: Alert for Marion; Schley; Sumter; Webster (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:25PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marion, northeastern Webster, southwestern Schley and northwestern Sumter Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 525 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Friendship, or 8 miles northeast of Preston, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Preston, Putnam, Church Hill, Friendship and Draneville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
